text: The 2008–09 Boston Bruins season is the Bruins' 84th season in the National Hockey League (NHL). == Regular season == == Playoffs == The Bruins beat the Montreal Canadiens in the Conference Quarter-Finals 4 games to none, but lost to the Carolina Hurricanes in the Conference Semi-Finals 3 games to 4. ==References== Category:National Hockey League team seasons Category:2008 in ice hockey Category:2009 in ice hockey Category:2008 in Boston Category:2009 in the United States
title: 2008–09 Boston Bruins season
